snippet: Rick Perlstein’s “The Invisible Bridge” has been accused of sloppy scholarship, improper attribution and plagiarism.
abstract: Debate among scholars and historians is raging over Rick Perlstein book The Invisible Bridge: The Fall of Nixon and the Rise of Reagan, which documents rise of Pres Ronald Reagan; many are accusing Perlstein of playing fast and loose with facts, using improper attribution and outright plagiarism.
lead_paragraph: Rick Perlstein’s “The Invisible Bridge” has been accused of sloppy scholarship, improper attribution and plagiarism.
